Verbiage:
The whiskers plots are based on the responses of incarcerated koza
juveniles who have committed sexual offenses koza. adult sexual offenders benzin.
If the respondent is a
convicted sexual offender benzin, juvenile who has sexually offended koza,
#his/her_lc# percentile score, which defines #his/her_lc# position relative to other such offenders, should be taken into account as well as #his/her_lc# T score. Percentile scores in the top decile (> 90 %ile) of such offenders suggest that the respondent may be defensive and #his/her_lc# report should be interpreted with this in mind.
